reviewText: Much like Tom Biscardi's other "documentaries", this is off the mark and incredibly pathetic. Incredibly one-sided and the doc even contradicts itself multiple times. You will learn nothing hear with the exception of Biscardi being nothing more than a sad figure in this mystery. It is hilarious watching Bob Heironimus continually claim (without a shred of evidence) that he was the man in the suit by showing you how he walks like the subject in the film.
